languages.text: "Надо иметь очень, очень много самоуверенности — или наглости — чтобы воровать чужих подданных для карьеров собственного мира-тюрьмы. Представляю, как бесились губернаторы, узнавая, что их рабочая сила теперь гнет спины на Веабос-6!"

"It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"
languages.original_text: "Надо иметь очень, очень много самоуверенности — или наглости — чтобы воровать чужих подданных для карьеров собственного мира-тюрьмы. Представляю, как бесились губернаторы, узнавая, что их рабочая сила теперь гнет спины на Веабос-6!"

traits.locale_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to steal someone else's subjects and make them work in the quarries of your penal world. I can picture the faces of the maddened governors when they learned that their workforce was now breaking its backs on Vheabos VI!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to steal someone else's subjects and make them work in the quarries of your penal world. I can picture the faces of the maddened governors when they learned that their workforce was now breaking its backs on Vheabos VI!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Il faut être drôlement sûr de soi, ou sacrément culotté, pour enlever les sujets d'un rival et les condamner aux travaux forcés dans les carrières de votre propre monde pénal. Je vois d'ici la tête qu'ont dû tirer les gouverneurs quand ils ont appris que leur précieuse main-d'œuvre s'échinait désormais sur Vhéabos-VI ! »
languages.original_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"

traits.locale_text: « Il faut être drôlement sûr de soi, ou sacrément culotté, pour enlever les sujets d'un rival et les condamner aux travaux forcés dans les carrières de votre propre monde pénal. Je vois d'ici la tête qu'ont dû tirer les gouverneurs quand ils ont appris que leur précieuse main-d'œuvre s'échinait désormais sur Vhéabos-VI ! »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Se necesita mucha confianza... o descaro... para arrebatar los súbditos de otro gobernante y ponerlos a trabajar en tu mundo penal. ¡Puedo imaginarme sus expresiones coléricas cuando descubrieron que sus trabajadores ahora se dejaban la piel Vheabos VI!».
languages.original_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"

traits.locale_text: «Se necesita mucha confianza... o descaro... para arrebatar los súbditos de otro gobernante y ponerlos a trabajar en tu mundo penal. ¡Puedo imaginarme sus expresiones coléricas cuando descubrieron que sus trabajadores ahora se dejaban la piel Vheabos VI!».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「他者の臣民をさらってきて、己の流刑惑星の採石場で働かせるというのは、よほどの自信…あるいは度胸がなければできないようなことだ。自分たちの労働力がヴィアボス・VIで一生懸命働いていると知った時の総督たちの憤怒の形相が目に浮かぶようだ！」
languages.original_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"

traits.locale_text: 「他者の臣民をさらってきて、己の流刑惑星の採石場で働かせるというのは、よほどの自信…あるいは度胸がなければできないようなことだ。自分たちの労働力がヴィアボス・VIで一生懸命働いていると知った時の総督たちの憤怒の形相が目に浮かぶようだ！」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “抢走别人的臣民，逼迫他们在刑罚世界的采石场里为你工作，这么干需要相当的自信，也需要相当的胆量。我都能想象得到，那些总督听说他们的臣民在维博斯六号星上累死累活的时候，他们恐怕都要暴跳如雷了！”
languages.original_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"

traits.locale_text: “抢走别人的臣民，逼迫他们在刑罚世界的采石场里为你工作，这么干需要相当的自信，也需要相当的胆量。我都能想象得到，那些总督听说他们的臣民在维博斯六号星上累死累活的时候，他们恐怕都要暴跳如雷了！”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Es ist ein Zeichen von Selbstvertrauen – oder Unverschämtheit –, die Untertanen eines anderen abzuwerben und in den Steinbrüchen seiner eigenen Strafwelt schuften zu lassen. Ich kann mir die empörten Gesichter der Gouverneure vorstellen, als sie erfuhren, dass ihre Arbeiter nun auf Vheabos-VI den Rücken krumm machen."
languages.original_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein Zeichen von Selbstvertrauen – oder Unverschämtheit –, die Untertanen eines anderen abzuwerben und in den Steinbrüchen seiner eigenen Strafwelt schuften zu lassen. Ich kann mir die empörten Gesichter der Gouverneure vorstellen, als sie erfuhren, dass ihre Arbeiter nun auf Vheabos-VI den Rücken krumm machen."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Başka birinin tebaasını kaçak bir şekilde avlayıp sonra da onları kendi ceza dünyandaki taş ocaklarında çalıştırmak, bayağı bir öz güven ister. Veyahut da arsızlık. İş güçlerinin artık Vheabos VI'da ter akıttığını öğrendiklerinde valilerin yüzünde oluşan öfkeyi hayal edebiliyorum!"
languages.original_text: "It takes a lot of confidence — or nerve — to poach another's subjects and put them to work in the quarries of your own penal world. I can picture the governors' outraged faces when they learned their workforce was now breaking their backs on Vheabos VI!"
